description:
Sony Research and AI Singapore (AISG) will collaborate on research for the SEA-LION family of large language models (LLMs). SEA-LION, which stands for Southeast Asian Languages In One Network, aims to improve the accuracy and capability of AI models when processing languages from the region. This is particularly important given the linguistic diversity of Southeast... Read more »

The post Sony and AI Singapore collaborate on SEA-LION LLMs appeared first on AI News.
title: Sony and AI Singapore collaborate on SEA-LION LLMs
